item.title: GhIQD10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G0420 Gene Symbol: GhIQD10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhIQD10 promoted resistance to verticillium wilt in cotton.

item.title: GmBES1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17g248900 Gene Symbol: GmBES1-1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmBES1-1 dampens the activity of GmNSP1/2 to mediate brassinosteroid inhibition of nodulation in soybean.

item.title: JcSEP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JcSEP3 Gene Name: SEPALLATA3 Genome: Species: Jatropha curcas Functional Descriptions: An ortholog of the MADS-box gene SEPALLATA3 regulates stamen development in the woody plant Jatropha curcas.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdBZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000157809 Gene Symbol: MdBZR1 Gene Name: BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Revealed the antagonistic relationship between light and brassinosteroid (BR) signaling pathways, which is mediated by BRASSINAZOLE-RESISTANT 1 (MdBZR1) and the B-box protein MdCOL6.

item.title: MdCOL6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD17G1243400 Gene Symbol: MdCOL6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBZR1–MdCOL6 mediates brassinosteroid- and light-regulated anthocyanin synthesis in apple.

item.title: SlBRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlBRI1 Gene Name: BRASSINOSTEROID INSENSITIVE 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of SlBRI1 driven by the Atrd29A promoter could increase the cold resistance of tomato plants during chilling stress but did not improve the expression of SlBRI1 and plant growth under normal conditions.

item.title: StBIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G001350.2 Gene Symbol: StBIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StSN2 interacts with the brassinosteroid signaling suppressor StBIN2 to maintain tuber dormancy.

item.title: StBRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMT400050728 Gene Symbol: StBRI1 Gene Name: BRASSINOSTEROID-INSENSITIVE 1 Genome: Spud DB Potato Genomics Resource data libraries Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The brassinosteroid receptor StBRI1 promotes tuber development by enhancing plasma membrane H+-ATPase activity in potato.

item.title: StSN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.01G050660.1 Gene Symbol: StSN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StSN2 interacts with the brassinosteroid signaling suppressor StBIN2 to maintain tuber dormancy.

item.title: TaSAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS3B02G445100 Gene Symbol: TaSAMT1 Gene Name: SA methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Methyltransferase TaSAMT1 mediates wheat freezing tolerance by integrating brassinosteroid and salicylic acid signaling.

item.title: TaSK1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaSK1A Gene Name: SHAGGY-like kinase1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We report the identification and structural characterization of two GSK homologs named TaSK1 and TaSK2 in the hexaploid wheat genome as well as a widespread phylogenetic analysis of land plant GSKs.
